metaDescription: Explore how Eye On Idea designs and builds websites for small and mid-sized businesses - from strategy and visual identity to launch and ongoing support.

hero.title: Our Work
hero.subtitle: Strategy, design, and development - delivered.
hero.description: A look at the projects we have designed and built for our clients and our own brands, from concept to production.

contact.title: Ready to start your project?
contact.description: We work with small and mid-sized businesses to build websites that look great and perform even better. Let us talk about what we can do for you.
